changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it is because it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Plugin compatible debian 11 et plus: Plugin compatible with Debian 11 and above
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis ou certains messa: Fixed an issue where some messages could be processed twice
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug lors de l'applicatio: Fixed a bug when applying some templates
changelog.md.Correction d'un warning lors du lancemen: Fixed warning when launching the daemon
changelog.md.Si une commande est de type binaire ou n: If a command is of binary or numeric type and jeedom receives an array or object then the value is ignored (corrects a problem with Shelly 2.5
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la gestion de la: Fixed a bug on the management of equipment batteries linked between Jeedom
changelog.md.Mise en place d'optimisation sur la gest: Implementation of optimization on the management of equipment transmitted with Jeedom 4.5
changelog.md.Ajout d'une sécurité pour éviter de mett: Added security to avoid putting a topic used by a plugin in the root topic
changelog.md.Ajout d'un assistant pour lier Mosquitto: Added a wizard to easily link Mosquitto from two Jeedoms
changelog.md.Ajout de la possibilité d'envoyer les in: Added the ability to send information to the Jeedom cloud to make two Jeedoms communicate over the internet (not open to users at the moment)
changelog.md.Activation de la découverte auto par déf: Enable auto-discovery by default (can be disabled from Plugin -> Programming -> Mqtt manager
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la création de l: Fixed a bug on the creation of the command indicating the status of a remote Jeedom (through the Jeedom monitor equipment of the virtual plugin
changelog.md.Ajout du topic SYS (pour avoir les infor: Added the SYS topic (to have internal MQTT information)
changelog.md.sys permettant de récupérer des informat: sys to retrieve information on the broker (message received/sent total/1min/5min/15min, memory load
changelog.md.Vérification du listenner à chaque démar: Check the listener each time the daemon starts
changelog.md.Ajout d'un message online et offline lor: Added an online and offline message when starting and stopping (wanted or not) the daemon in topic_racine/state
changelog.md.monitor depuis le plugin virtuel, le plu: monitor from the virtual plugin, the plugin will automatically add the state command (online or offline), if you already have this equipment you must restart the discovery
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la transmission: Fixed a bug on the transmission of the real type of equipment (when transmitting equipment between jeedom
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la duplication d: Fixed bug on duplication of event listening task
changelog.md.Sur les équipements exportés si le plugi: On exported equipment if the source plugin exists on the target jeedom then jeedom will display the plugin icon
changelog.md.Pas d'erreur dans les logs lors de la tr: No error in the logs when transmitting the command (avoids breaking jeedom if the daemon is cut off
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'exécution des: Fixed a bug on the execution of message type commands
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'envoi des équi: Fixed a bug when sending equipment from the configuration window
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton pour voir les logs de: Added a button to see mosquitto logs (if it is in local broker mode)
changelog.md.Mise à jour de la documentation pour mie: Updated the documentation to better explain how to synchronize topics between two mosquitto
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'envoi des batt: Fixed bug on sending batteries (non static call method)
changelog.md.Amélioration de l'affichage de la fenêtr: Improved display of the configuration window for transmitted equipment
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les commandes or: Fixed bug on orphaned commands when transmitting through mqtt
changelog.md.Pour les équipements transmis sur Mqtt,: For devices transmitted on Mqtt, the plugin now sends the battery level every night
changelog.md.Le plugin pour gérer le niveau de batter: The plugin to manage the battery level transmitted between Jeedom
changelog.md.Gestion correcte des commandes de rafraî: Correct management of refresh commands on widgets on equipment transmitted between Jeedom
changelog.md.Lors de l'envoi de la découverte entre J: When sending the discovery between Jeedom the values of the commands are also transmitted (no need to wait for an update of the value to have it on the target
changelog.md.Lors la transmission d'équipement entre: When transmitting equipment between Jeedom the plugin now manages the real type of equipment to be compatible with mobile applications
changelog.md.Ajout d'une fenêtre de configuration glo: Added a global configuration window for the transmission of equipment between Jeedom
changelog.md.8 ou plus, possibilité de ne plus envoye: 8 or more, possibility of no longer sending all the equipment on the MQTT broker but only certain ones (to be configured in the advanced configuration of the equipment to be transmitted
changelog.md.Discovery entre Jeedom (pour faire dialo: Discovery between Jeedom (to make 2 Jeedoms communicate with each other via mqtt
changelog.md.Possibilité depuis la page de configurat: Possibility from the plugin configuration page to delete the subscription of a plugin
changelog.md.Suppression d'un check daemon launchable: Deleting a launchable daemon check (done when launching the daemon in all cases
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'état du démon: Fixed a bug on the state of the daemon (started when not
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'état du brocke: Fixed a bug on brocker status
changelog.md.Possibilité de corriger le QOS par défau: Possibility to correct the default QOS
changelog.md.Début d'ajout du système de découverte a: Start of adding the auto discovery system
changelog.md.Amélioration de la gestion de Mosquitto: Improved mosquitto handling in local mode
changelog.md.Ajout d'un système auto-découverte pour: Added auto-discovery system for some beta modules (esphome, tasmota and shelly)
changelog.md.Ajout de l'image des modules: Added the image of the modules
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le client ID (si: Fixed a bug on the client ID (if several jeedom on the same broker
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le temps maximum: Fixed a bug on the maximum time allowed for installing dependencies
changelog.md.Ajout d'un message invitant à rétablir l: Added a message prompting to restore permissions on folders before installing Mosquitto in case of error
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton permettant de désinsta: Added a button to uninstall a local Mosquitto broker on the general plugin configuration page

index.md.permet de connecter Jeedom à un broker M: allows you to connect Jeedom to an existing MQTT broker or to install one locally or under Docker using the plugin
index.md.Ce plugin est en mesure de cumuler plusi: This plugin is able to combine several features
index.md.Servir de socle aux autres plugins pour: Serve as a base for other plugins for everything related to MQTT
index.md.Servir en mode \"standalone\" par la cré: Serve in "standalone" mode by creating action/info commands for sending/receiving messages on MQTT
index.md.Piloter Jeedom depuis un autre équipemen: Control Jeedom from another MQTT equipment
index.md.Le plugin peut aussi bien piloter des co: The plugin can both drive commands and retransmit all Jeedom events on MQTT
index.md.Après installation et activation du plug: After installing and activating the plugin, the installation of dependencies should start unless automatic management has been disabled beforehand
index.md.Dans ce cas, il faudra cliquer sur le bo: In this case, you will have to click on the button
index.md.Pour commencer la configuration du plugi: To start configuring the plugin, it is necessary to select the connection mode to the broker from the 3 possible choices
index.md.Le broker Mosquitto est installé directe: The Mosquitto broker is installed directly on the machine that hosts Jeedom
index.md.Le broker Mosquitto est installé et conf: The Mosquitto broker is automatically installed and configured in a Docker container using the official plugin
index.md.Dans ce mode, l'installation peut durer: In this mode, the installation can take several minutes
index.md.Dans le cas de l'utilisation d'un broker: In the case of the use of an already existing broker, it is enough to fill in its address
index.md.Une fois le broker Mosquitto installé: Once the Mosquitto broker is installed

index.md.L'authentification est obligatoire en mo: Authentication is mandatory in local mode
index.md.Suite à l'ajout il faut redémarrer Jeedo: Following the addition, Jeedom must be restarted for this to take effect

index.md.Liste des plugins abonnés au plugin MQTT: List of plugins subscribed to the MQTT Manager plugin in the form `plugin(topic)`
index.md.Il est possible de créer des équipements: It is possible to create MQTT equipment directly in the plugin
index.md.Il faut indiquer le topic racine de l'éq: You must indicate the root topic of the equipment
index.md.attention le topic racine ne peux pas av: Be careful the root topic cannot have more than 2 levels (exe `level1/level2`) then depending on the type of commands
index.md.Pour exemple, si vous mettez `toto\/1`,: For example, if you put `toto/1`, all the messages on the topic `test/toto/1` will be automatically written on the command in question
index.md.Le système est capable de gérer les cham: The system is able to manage json type fields, in this case you have to put `toto/1/key1` or `toto/1/key1/key2` to go down one level
index.md.il suffit d'indiquer le topic et le mess: just indicate the topic and the message
index.md.Pour exemple, si vous mettez `toto\/2` a: For example, if you put `toto/2` with the message `plop`, each click on the command will send the message `plop` to the topic `test/toto/2`
index.md.Dans les commandes de type action vous p: In action type commands you can use the tags `

index.md.D'autre part, si le message est de type: On the other hand, if the message is of the `json` type, you must add the `json` prefix to it
index.md.Le topic `jeedom` est reservé (cela peut: The `jeedom` topic is reserved (this can be changed in the configuration), so do not send anything other than commands to drive jeedom

index.md.Transmettre des informations entre deux: Transmit information between two jeedoms by MQTT
index.md.Sur le Jeedom source (celui qui envoie l: On the source Jeedom (the one that sends the information) you have to go to the plugin configuration and click on "MQTT Information" at the "Mqtt local transmission" level then copy what is displayed in the window that appears
index.md.Sur le Jeedom cible (celui qui recoit) i: On the target Jeedom (the one that receives) you must click on "Receive" at the level of "Mqtt tranmission local" and paste the information copied just before
index.md.Il est possible grace au plugin de trans: It is possible thanks to the plugin to transmit commands between two Jeedom (this system is dedicated to replacing jeelink), here is how to configure it

index.md.Dans la configuration du plugin mqtt man: In the configuration of the mqtt manager plugin, configure the "Jeedom root topic" field, by default it is jeedom, it is recommended to put a unique value per Jeedom (e.g
index.md.Ensuite vous pouvez soit cocher la case: Then you can either check the "Transmit all events" box (still in the configuration of the mqtt manager plugin), this is not the most recommended because it will send all the equipment to the target jeedom
index.md.Le mieux étant d'aller sur les équipemen: The best thing is to go to the equipment you want to transmit, in the advanced configuration of the equipment (button at the top right on the equipment configuration page) then in "Additional information" to check "Transmit the MQTT equipment
index.md.Sur le jeedom cible il faut: On the target jeedom it is necessary
index.md.Sans la configuration du plugin mqtt man: Without configuring the mqtt manager plugin, configure the “Linked Jeedom Topic” field by setting the value of “Jeedom root topic” of the source jeedom
index.md.Vous pouvez mettre plusieurs Jeedom sour: You can put several Jeedom sources by separating them with
index.md.Attention il faut faire très attention i: Be careful, you have to be very careful here, you should definitely not have the same thing for "Jeedom root topic" on jeedoms
index.md.Ce champs est l'identifiant unique du je: This field is the unique identifier of the jeedom so it is absolutely necessary to have different values
index.md.Dans plugin -> programmation -> Mqtt man: In plugin -> programming -> Mqtt manager activate auto-discovery (inactive by default
index.md.Ensuite vous avez juste à retourner sur: Then you just have to return to the jeedom still on the plugin configuration and do "Send discovery
index.md.Cette configuration part du principe que: This configuration assumes that the jeedoms are connected to the same brocker mosquitto
index.md.Si vous ne pouvez pas le faire il faut a: If you can't do it, you must configure one of the two mosquittos so that it sends the values of the desired topics to another mosquitto (see next chapter) or go through the assist mode which will do everything for you
index.md.Si vous changé la valeur du champs \"Tem: If you change the value of the "Publication template" field (empty by default) then auto discovery will not create the correct orders, it is up to you to adapt the configuration in this case
index.md.Si vous avez utilisez l'assistant pour l: If you used the wizard for local transmission you do not need to follow this part, Jeedom has already done everything for you
index.md.Il est possible de lier des topics entre: It is possible to link topics between several mosquitto, here is the configuration to add in mosquitto
index.md.La configuration n'est a faire que sur u: The configuration only needs to be done on one of the brocker mosquitto
index.md.Exemple vous voulez envoyer depuis jeedo: Example you want to send equipment from jeedom_2 to jeedom_1 by having
index.md.Voila la configuration qu'il faut ajoute: Here is the configuration that must be added in jeedom_2 (mosquito parameter
index.md.peut être ce que vous voulez et n'a aucu: can be whatever you want and it doesn't matter
index.md.Vous pouvez par exemple faire nom_jeedom: You can for example do name_jeedom_source-name_jeedom_target
index.md.n'a pas non plus d'importance il faut ju: doesn't matter either, you just have to put a unique string
index.md.nom du topic local souvent ça sera \"Top: name of the local topic often it will be "Jeedom root topic" of the local jeedom
name of the local topic often it will be "Jeedom root topic" of the remote jeedom
index.md.Dans jeedom les identifiants (`username`: In jeedom the identifiers (`username` and `password`) are available on the plugin configuration page in "Authentication" in the form `username`
index.md.Liée des Jeedom à travers internet: Linked to Jeedom through the internet
index.md.Il ne faut faire cela que si vos Jeedom: You only need to do this if your Jeedoms are not on the same local network
index.md.Si vous faite cela avec deux Jeedom sur: If you do this with two Jeedoms on the same local network you will have performance issues, reliability and losses in the event of an internet outage (or maintenance of the Jeedom cloud
index.md.Pour résumer cette configuration est à u: To summarize this configuration is to be used as a last resort
index.md.Pour liée des Jeedom à travers internet: To connect Jeedoms through the internet there are several possibilities: you can deploy a mosquitto at a cloud host or open one of your mosquittos on the internet (be careful with security in the event of a problem Jeedom cannot be held responsible
index.md.Ou utiliser le service cloud Jeedom (seu: Or use the Jeedom cloud service (only case covered in this documentation)
index.md.Le service cloud Jeedom n'est pas encore: Jeedom cloud service is not yet open to users we must first ensure that all load and reliability tests are ok
index.md.Pour utiliser le service Jeedom cloud c': To use the Jeedom cloud service it's very simple, on the source Jeedom (the one that sends the information) you just have to go to the plugin configuration and click on "Send" at the "Jeedom cloud" level, then you have to note "Jeedom cloud identifier
index.md.Ensuite allez sur le Jeedom cible (celui: Then go to the target Jeedom (the one that receives the information) and in the plugin configuration click on "Receive" and indicate "Cloud Id" of the source (retrieved in the previous step
index.md.Voila c'est fini il ne vous reste plus q: That's it, it's finished, all you have to do is on the source Jeedom check the equipment to transmit then click on "Send discovery" in the configuration of the source Jeedom plugin
index.md.Le service Jeedom cloud ne marche qu'ave: The Jeedom cloud service only works with Jeedoms linked to the same market account, it is not possible to transmit information between Jeedoms on different market accounts
index.md.Suite a une mise à jour des packages sys: Following an update of the system packages (apt) or an unattended upgrades, nothing works anymore
index.md.La mise à jour du package mosquitto reme: Updating the mosquitto package resets the service file to default and therefore mosquitto no longer points to the correct configuration file
index.md.Pour corriger cela c'est très simple il: To correct this, it's very simple, just restart the installation of mosquitto from the plugin configuration page
